author: crebsy0x
content: hey all, glad to be here ðŸ¤— I have a client deploying many testnet rollups with sepolia as the settlement layer. The spending rate is ~3k sep ETH per month for running multiple sequencers. author: barnabasbusa
content: Which rollup is having issues with Sepolia funds? Maybe talk with your client to have them reach out to us directly. We are not generally gatekeepers of any funds.

author: crebsy0x
content: sounds good, it's for multiple OP-stack based rollups which use blobs quite heavily and fee payments just went through the roof recently. Could we create some group on telegram or discord to further talk about this and what options we have ? can dm u all handles
